name: Batch beam Python flex template
description: Batch beam example for python flex template.

parameters.name: input_gcs_path
parameters.label: Input GCS path for the CSV file
parameters.helpText: GCS path for the CSV file to read from. Must be a valid Cloud Storage URL, beginning with gs://.

parameters.name: output_bq_dataset
parameters.label: Output BigQuery dataset
parameters.helpText: Name of the BigQuery dataset to write to.

parameters.name: output_bq_table
parameters.label: Output BigQuery table
parameters.helpText: Name of the BigQuery table to write to.

parameters.name: temp_location
parameters.label: Temporary location for pipeline artifacts
parameters.helpText: GCS path for temporary storage of pipeline artifacts.
